mapper.sql: ID, DELIVERY_ID, DELIVERYDETAIL_CODE, SIGN_NO,SIGN_STATUS, MODULE_ID, PRPT_IDS, ASSET_NUMBER,TOTAL_MONEY, DEL_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, REMARK
mapper.select: select p.PRPT_ID,pr.name,p.ASSET_TEMP_ID,p.PRPT_order,pr.code,p.PK_FLAG from T_ASSET_TMPL_PRPTS p left join T_ASSET_PRPT_INFO pr on p.PRPT_ID=pr.id where p.ASSET_TEMP_ID=#{moduleId} and p.PRPT_VALUE is null and p.del_flag=0 ORDER BY p.PRPT_order asc

select p.PRPT_ID,pr.name,p.ASSET_TEMP_ID,p.PRPT_order,p.PK_FLAG,pr.code,p.PRPT_VALUE from T_ASSET_TMPL_PRPTS p left join T_ASSET_PRPT_INFO pr on p.PRPT_ID=pr.id where p.ASSET_TEMP_ID=#{moduleId} and p.del_flag=0 ORDER BY p.PRPT_order asc

select d.DELIVERY_CODE as "deliveryCode",d.DELIVERY_NAME as "deliveryName", d.SUPPLIER_ID as "supplierId",s.cus_name as "custName",d.SIGN_ADDRESS as "signAddress",t.CONTRACT_CODE as "contractCode",t.CONTRACT_NAME as "contractName",t.CONTRACT_TYPE as "contractType" from T_ORDER_DELIVEMIDDLE m LEFT JOIN T_ORDER_DELIVERECORDS d on m.DELIVERY_ID=d.id LEFT JOIN T_ORDER_CONTRACT c on d.order_id=c.id LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACT t on c.CONTRACT_ID=t.id left join T_CUSTOMER s on d.SUPPLIER_ID=s.id where m.id=#{id} and m.DEL_FLAG=0
select id from T_ORDER_DELIVEMIDDLE where DELIVERY_ID=#{id} and del_flag=0
